tag_narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere
Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation
title_narrative: Strengthen Gender Equality and Empowerment in Mine Action in the Mine/Explosive Remnants of War (ERW) affected ASEAN Member States
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: Contribution to ARMAC to support the improvement of knowledge related to gender and women's empowerment in humanitarian demining programs in the ASEAN region through study, training and knowledge/experience/expertise exchange activities.

Contributo ad ARMAC per supportare il miglioramento della conoscenza relativa alla tematica di genere e all’'empowerment femminile nei programmi di sminamento umanitario nella regione ASEAN, mediante attività di studio, di formazione e di scambio di conoscenze/esperienze/expertise
